fields.description:
If this is deprecated (which it is) needs links to the new information.

http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/3.0/#!/api/Modules.Facebook <-- generates a 404

http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/api/Titanium.Facebook

!http://content.screencast.com/users/Stephen_Feather/folders/Jing/media/03553eaf-6192-4f54-a0f3-3c536523f864/00000312.png!
fields.summary: Docs :: Module.Facebook referenced in the deprecated alert for Ti.Facebook, yet doesn't appear in modules section

comments.body: Facebook module documentation should be under Modules section, as pointed out by you. Documentation team is actively working on resolving this issue under ticket TIDOC-1491.
